metadata.description: cc10x v5.8.0 - Lean development workflow plugin with Auto-Claude patterns for bug prevention

plugins.name: cc10x
plugins.description: Lean development workflow plugin with 6 agents, 11 skills, and Auto-Claude patterns for bug prevention. Features AUTO-EXECUTE routing, TDD enforcement, evidence-based verification, pre-implementation checklists, self-critique gates, and risk-based testing.
